Uses of Interface
org.apache.commons.math4.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem

  • Packages that use LeastSquaresProblem 
    Package Description
    org.apache.commons.math4.fitting
    Classes to perform curve fitting.
    org.apache.commons.math4.fitting.leastsquares
    This package provides algorithms that minimize the residuals between observations and model values.
